events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and resume details.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case and will be in contact soon to guide you through next steps.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully, and the feedback from our recruiter was very encouraging.
Thank you for promptly responding to our queries and confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th, where you will demonstrate your software development skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview, impressing the panel with your coding knowledge and problem-solving abilities.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th to discuss cultural fit and other employment details.
You completed the HR interview with positive remarks on your communication skills and alignment with company values.
We have formally extended a job offer for the Software Engineer position, including salary and benefits details.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
You have officially accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to internal tools, introductions, and orientation schedules.
Your hiring process is now complete. Welcome officially to our engineering team, and we look forward to your contributions.
